text: Hum sirf teri hi ibadat kertay hain aur sirf tujh hi say madad chahatay hain Shuroo Allah kay naam say jo bara meharban nehayat reham kerney wala hai 22.1. Logo! Apnay perwerdigar say daro! Bilshuba qayamat ka zalzala boht hi bari cheez hai 22.2. Jiss din tum ussay dekh lo gay her doodh pilaney wali apnay doodh peetay bachay ko bhool jayegi aur tamam hamal waliyon kay hamal girr jayen gay aur tu dekhay ga kay log madhosh dikhaee den gay halankay dar-haqeeqat who matwalay na hongay lekin Allah ka azab bara hi sakht hai 22.3. Baaz log Allah kay baray mein batein banatay hain aur woh bhi bey ilmi kay sath aur her sirkash shetan ki pairwee kertay hain 22.4. Jiss per (qazay-e-elahee) likh di gaee hai kay jo koi uss ki rafaqat keray ga woh ussay gumrah ker dey ga aur ussay aag kay azab ki taraf ley jayeg
